txt.en: '[placeholder]! I have new orders from Scout-master Ausma for you! She says that Warlord Dushtalbúk and Loknashra have left Shakhajât with a host of hobgoblins, and are moving toward the Welkin-lofts. You are to meet Hórin and assist him as soon as you are able!\n\n'Look for him in the northern reaches of the Welkin-lofts, at a camp called Fellgát.'
'Ah, [placeholder]! Ausma's runner must have found you. Welcome to the top of the world!'

Ausma has sent word that the hobgoblins are moving into the Welkin-lofts.\n\nYour orders are to assist Hórin with tracking them down. You will find Hórin at a camp in the northern reaches of the Welkin-lofts called Fellgát.
Talk to Hórin in Fellgát, a camp in the northern reaches of the Welkin-lofts
A runner from Scout-master Ausma has found you. Your orders are to assist Hórin in the peaks of the Welkin-lofts!
